attributes.action: Minimum life sentence for sexual assault on a minor
attributes.additional_details: It’s one of the most disgusting criminal acts with in our country which ruins multiple life there are less serious crimes which have higher sentences for them and I think anyone who has experienced this crime or knows anyone knows the true impact it has on them for the remainder of there lives
attributes.background: I want the government to give minimum life sentences to anyone who sexually assaults a minor from kissing them to sexual intercourse this is a pro flux crime that impacts the victim for a life time and people around them or anyone who builds relationships with them

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make rape, sexual assault and child sexual offences charges a minimum of life: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630304

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for child sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630578
